item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Hey guys i got a question i dont need it… Just wanne know!

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkreward”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5); < What means that String name = command.substring(5); ?

I realy wanne know so if i can make those commands with this : String name = command.substring(Anynumber);

(Other one) : else if (command.startsWith(“giveowner”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“youridudock”)) {
String name = command.substring(10); <

I hope someone can tell me! Thx
